title: PH Sales Representative
job_overview:
Sales Representative (Financial Services Sales)

Are you a persuasive sales person who thrives on calls, lives for commissions, and loves the hustle?

We’re looking for a high-performing Sales Representative who isn’t afraid to make hundreds of calls a day, crush goals, and sell with confidence. If you’ve sold loans or merchant cash advances (MCA) before — even better. We want someone who knows the game, speaks fluent and polished English, and is hungry for high earnings.

What You’ll Be Doing:

Calling leads daily (lots of calls!)
Pitching and closing loan/MCA deals
Managing pipelines, follow-ups, and client relations
Collaborating with our team to hit ambitious targets

What We’re Looking For:

Proven experience in loan sales (MCA is a huge plus!)
Exceptional spoken English — clear, confident, and professional
High energy, self-motivated, and driven to succeed
Comfortable working independently and handling rejection like a pro
Willing to GRIND — we respect hustle!


What You Get:
Base Pay + aggressive commissions
Full-time
Work with a growing, supportive team
Room for career growth and bonuses
